case.title: ebony young lady seek exotic man - 20 (Upper West Side)
case.text: hi , my name is jasmine I am a young lady looking for an exotic male for a relationship or something along those lines. please be independent and between the ages of 22-30. I am a sweet honest loyal voluptuous young lady. please change the subject line to your favorite color and please send a picture , you'll get mines in return. thank you.
